name: Super Skyland
description:
Smash your way through a robot junkyard, tumble through candy world, beat the traps in puzzle world! A fun adventure featuring a tiny hero trying to rescue his kidnapped Teddy Bear.

Easy to play, simply tap and hold to fly up and let go to fall down!

** Cool worlds to explore
** Tons of secrets hidden away in each level
** Awesome gadgets: Cannons, Blubber, Chopper Boxes, Bubble Busters
** Customize your hero by unlocking cool outfits
** Unlock crazy power-ups like the Bat Suit

Smashing Fun For Everyone
